verses.verse: Let <S%G5293><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> be in subjection to <S%G5293><s%> the higher <S%G5242><s%> authorities, <S%G1849><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> <S%G1487><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and those <S%G1849><s%> who exist <S%G5607><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ordained <S%G5021><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> he who resists <S%G498><s%> the authority, <S%G1849><s%> withstands <S%G436><s%> the ordinance <S%G1296><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> those who withstand <S%G436><s%> will receive <S%G2983><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> judgment. <S%G2917><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a terror <S%G5401><s%> to <S%G2041><s%> the good <S%G18><s%> work, <S%G2041><s%> but <S%G235><s%> to <S%G2041><s%> the evil. <S%G2556><s%> Do you <S%G2309><s%> desire to have no <S%G3361><s%> fear of <S%G5399><s%> the authority? <S%G1849><s%> Do <S%G4160><s%> that which is good, <S%G18><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you will have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%>

for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> good. <S%G18><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you do <S%G4160><s%> that which is evil, <S%G2556><s%> be afraid, <S%G5399><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he doesn't <S%G3756><s%> bear <S%G5409><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> in vain; <S%G1500><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a servant <S%G1249><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> an avenger <S%G1558><s%> for wrath <S%G3709><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him who does <S%G4238><s%> evil. <S%G2556><s%>

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you need <S%G318><s%> to be in subjection, <S%G5293><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the wrath, <S%G3709><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>' sake.

<S%G1063><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> this reason <S%G5124><s%> you <S%G5055><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> pay taxes, <S%G5411><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> servants <S%G3011><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'s service, <S%G4342><s%> attending continually on <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> very thing. <S%G846><s%>

Give <S%G591><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> to everyone <S%G3956><s%> what you owe: <S%G3782><s%> taxes <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> taxes <S%G5411><s%> are due; <S%G5056><s%> customs to whom <S%G3588><s%> customs; <S%G5056><s%> respect <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> respect; <S%G5401><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor. <S%G5092><s%>

Owe <S%G3784><s%> no one <S%G3367><s%> anything, <S%G1487><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one another; <S%G240><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> he who loves <S%G25><s%> his neighbor <S%G2087><s%> has fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the commandments, <S%G3588><s%> "You shall <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery, <S%G3431><s%>" "You shall <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> murder, <S%G5407><s%>" "You shall <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> steal, <S%G2813><s%>" "You shall <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> give false testimony, <S%G5576><s%>" "You shall <S%G1937><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> covet, <S%G1937><s%>" and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1487><s%> whatever <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> there are, <S%G346><s%> are all summed up in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> saying, <S%G3056><s%> namely, <S%G1722><s%> "You shall love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> yourself. <S%G1438><s%>"
Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G99999><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> harm <S%G2556><s%> a neighbor. <S%G4139><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is the fulfillment <S%G4138><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>

Do <S%G2532><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> the time, <S%G2540><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> it is already <S%G2235><s%> time <S%G5610><s%> for you <S%G2248><s%> to awaken <S%G1453><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> sleep, <S%G5258><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2257><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> is now <S%G3568><s%> nearer <S%G1452><s%> to us than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we first believed. <S%G4100><s%>

The night <S%G3571><s%> is far gone, <S%G1161><s%> and the day <S%G2250><s%> is near. <S%G1448><s%> Let <S%G659><s%>'s therefore <S%G3767><s%> throw off <S%G659><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness, <S%G4655><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> let <S%G1746><s%>'s put on the armor <S%G3696><s%> of light. <S%G5457><s%>

Let us walk <S%G4043><s%> properly, <S%G5613><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day; <S%G2250><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in reveling <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> in sexual promiscuity <S%G2845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lustful <S%G766><s%> acts, <S%G3361><s%> and not in strife <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> jealousy. <S%G2205><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> put on <S%G1746><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> provision <S%G4307><s%> for the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> its lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
